result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for providing a Redis client and instance implementation for connecting to and interacting with a Redis database.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating Redis client and instance functionalities in separate files for better organization and maintainability.

pkg/redis/client.go.purpose: This file defines a Redis client configuration and creation logic for connecting to a Redis database.

pkg/redis/instance.go.purpose: This file provides a Redis instance implementation for getting and setting key-value pairs in a Redis database.
